alert.note: Alert for Branch; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:07AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Joseph and northern Branch Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 307 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Colon, or 11 miles northeast of Three Rivers, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Quincy, Union City, Centreville, Colon, Nottawa, Girard, Leonidas, Mendon, Sherwood, Fairfax, South Butler, Wasepi, Matteson Lake and Hodunk. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 12 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
